hybrid network.from sentence: Particularly , we propose a hybrid network , named CASCADE , that utilizes both content and contextual - information required for sarcasm detection .

user profiling.from sentence: First , it performs user profiling to create user embeddings that capture indicative behavioral traits for sarcasm .

content - modeling.from sentence: It performs content - modeling using a Convolutional Neural Network ( CNN ) to extract its syntactic features .

writing style ( stylometry ) and persona.from sentence: It makes use of users ' historical posts to model their writing style ( stylometry ) and personality indicators , which are then fused into comprehensive user embeddings using a multi-view fusion approach , Canonical Correlation Analysis ( CCA ) .

contextual information.from sentence: Second , it extracts contextual information from the discourse of comments in the discussion forums .

document modeling.from sentence: This is done by document modeling of these consolidated comments belonging to the same forum .

contextual modeling phase.from sentence: After the contextual modeling phase , CASCADE is provided with a comment for sarcasm detection .

CNN representation.concatenated with: relevant user embedding and discourse features
CNN representation.from sentence: This CNN representation is then concatenated with the relevant user embedding and discourse features to get the final representation which is used for classification .
